    • isValidMove

      public boolean isValidMove(String pieceId, String pointId)
      Check if the move is valid. If it is,execute the move.
      Parameters:
      pieceId - The pieceId
      pointId - The pointId
      Returns:
      True if the move is valid. False otherwise.

    • canMove

      private boolean canMove(PointBoard pointBoardDest, PieceBoard pieceBoard)
      Verify if the move can be done, following the given rules.
      Parameters:
      pointBoardDest - The destination point
      pieceBoard - The PieceBoard.
      Returns:
      True if the move can be done. False otherwise.

      Execute the move.
      Parameters:
      pointBoard - The point board.
      pieceBoard - The piece board.

    • getOwnerOfPiece

      private PlayerThread getOwnerOfPiece(String pieceId)
      Parameters:
      pieceId - The piece's id.
      Returns:
      The player owner of the piece.

    • getPointBoardById

      private PointBoard getPointBoardById(String pointId)
      Parameters:
      pointId - The point's id.
      Returns:
      The PointBoard representation of the point.

    • getPieceBoard

      private PieceBoard getPieceBoard(PlayerThread playerThread, String pieceBoardId)
      Parameters:
      playerThread - The player owner of the piece.
      pieceBoardId - The piece's id.
      Returns:
      The PieceBoard representation of the piece.

    • isSecondPhase

      private boolean isSecondPhase()
      Check if the game is in the second phase.
      Returns:
      If turn > 6, then it is the second phase of the game.

    • getWinnerPlayer

      private PlayerThread getWinnerPlayer()
      Winner cases are: 0-1-4 | 0-2-5 | 0-3-6 | 1-2-3 | 4-5-6.
      Returns:
      The winner player. If no player won, return null.

    • getPlayerWhoOccupiesPoint

      private PlayerThread getPlayerWhoOccupiesPoint(PointBoard pointBoard)
      Parameters:
      pointBoard - The pointBoard.
      Returns:
      The player who occupies the given point.

    • checkWinnerSituation

      private void checkWinnerSituation()
      Check if there is any winner. If so, call server to send winner/loser.

    • getOccupiedPointBoard

      private PointBoard getOccupiedPointBoard(PieceBoard pieceBoard)
      Parameters:
      pieceBoard - The pieceBoard.
      Returns:
      The PointBoard occupied by given pieceBoard.
